summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the authorization handling component across a wide range of scenarios, including error conditions, retry limits, deadline enforcement, debug output, unsupported challenge types, and correct selection and processing of HTTP-01 and DNS challenges.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the ACME authorization workflow in production environments by detecting regressions and ensuring proper handling of edge cases, retries, and challenge preferences.
